question:
you live in a room in college which you share with another student. however, there are many problems with this arrangements and you find it very difficult to work
write a letter to the accommodation officer at the college, in your letter,
- describe the situation
- explain your problem and why it is difficult to work
- say what kind of accommodation you would prefer
text: I am Ravi from North block 22nd room and I am writing to let you know that few of problems which I am facing by my roommate due to the shared accommodation including late-night parties which made me  write this complaint letter to you.

As you know , I work from home including on weekends and It is been very tough to manage my work and take my client class due to bigger noise and late-night parties as well. On the other hand, during weekends  the entire flat members play fun games and they are not letting others  go to bed as they want some company for their fun and then what about my work ? how do I pay my rent without working in a critical situation due to ongoing Covid19?

I do not think I cannot bear this current situation, Hence, I would like to have a separate room with basic facilities in a good community. I am ready to pay even extra as I want to come out of this hell as soon as possible. Hoping that I would get into a nice society.
I look forward to hearing your response very soon to my request.
